verbs.description: sec settles fraud case with texas oil man [V: frack] [ARG0: master] oct 23- the u s securities and exchange commission said on tuesday it had agreed to settle a fraud case with texas oil and gas businessman christopher faulkner for 23 8 million faulkner who called himself the frack master was involved in a wide - ranging securities - fraud scheme that raised over 80 million from hundreds of investors nationwide the sec said securities fraud fraud dallas anil dsilva christopher faulkner debroop roy reuters sec us securities and exchange commission u s securities and exchange commission anil dilva texas
